name: Andre Luís de Medeiros Santos
content: André Santos André Santos PhD, 1995, University of Glasgow Associate Professor at Centro de Informática of Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (CIn-UFPE). Research Interests: Programming Languages, Functional Programming, Functional Languages, Code Optimization, Compilers. Courses: Theory and Implementation of Programming Languages (Compilers) Functional Programming Publications .NET-related Projects: Haskell.NET Haskell for Assignment Manager Integrating Haskell to VisualStudio.NET students' dissertations Address: Centro de Informática Universidade Federal de Pernambuco Caixa Postal 7851 - Cidade Universitária Recife PE 50732-970 Brazil Tel: (+55 81) 2126-8430, x4322 Fax: (+55 81) 2126-8438 e-mail: alms at cin.ufpe.br
